
import – Import libraries like pandas, numpy, etc.
isna() / isnull() – Check for missing values.
dropna() – Remove missing values.
fillna() – Fill missing values with a specific value or strategy.
replace() – Replace specific values in a dataset.
drop() – Remove unwanted columns or rows.
astype() – Convert data types.
duplicated() – Check for duplicate rows.
drop_duplicates() – Remove duplicate rows.
apply() – Apply functions to columns or rows.
str.strip() – Remove leading and trailing spaces from string values.
map() – Transform values in a column.
lambda – Anonymous function for quick data transformations.
query() – Filter data based on conditions.
